title: WZDx v4.0 Feed
description: The GeoJSON output of a WZDx v4.0 data feed

features.description: An array of GeoJSON Feature objects which represent WZDx road events

BoundingBox.title: GeoJSON Bounding Box
BoundingBox.description: Information on the coordinate range for a Geometry, Feature (RoadEventFeature), or FeatureCollection (WZDxFeed)

RoadEventFeedInfo.title: Road Event Feed Information
RoadEventFeedInfo.description: Describes WZDx feed header information such as metadata, contact information, and data sources

publisher.description: The organization responsible for publishing the feed

contact_name.description: The name of the individual or group responsible for the data feed

contact_email.description: The email address of the individual or group responsible for the data feed

update_frequency.description: The frequency in seconds at which the data feed is updated

update_date.description: The UTC date and time when the data feed was last updated

version.description: The WZDx specification version used to create the data feed, in 'major.minor' format

license.description: The URL of the license that applies to the data in the WZDx feed. This *must* be the string "https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/"

data_sources.description: A list of specific data sources for the road event data in the feed

RoadEventDataSource.title: Road Event Data Source
RoadEventDataSource.description: Describes information about a specific data source used to build the work zone data feed

data_source_id.description: Unique identifier for the organization providing work zone data

organization_name.description: The name of the organization for the authoritative source of the work zone data

contact_name.description: The name of the individual or group responsible for the data source

contact_email.description: The email address of the individual or group responsible for the data source

update_frequency.description: The frequency in seconds at which the data source is updated

update_date.description: The UTC date and time when the data source was last updated

location_verify_method.description: The method used to verify the accuracy of the location information

lrs_type.description: Describes the type of linear referencing system used for the milepost measurements

lrs_url.description: A URL where additional information on the LRS information and transformation information is stored

LocationMethod.title: Location Method Enumerated Type
LocationMethod.description: The typical method used to locate the beginning and end of a work zone impact area

RoadEventFeature.title: Road Event Feature (GeoJSON Feature)
RoadEventFeature.description: The container object for a WZDx road event; an instance of a GeoJSON Feature

id.description: A unique identifier issued by the data feed provider to identify the WZDx road event

type.description: The GeoJSON object type; must be 'Feature'

RoadEvent.title: Road Event
RoadEvent.description: Describes an activity taking place along a road segment

data_source_id.description: Identifies the data source from which the road event data is sourced from

road_names.description: A list of publicly known names of the road on which the event occurs. This may include the road number designated by a jurisdiction such as a county, state or interstate (e.g. I-5, VT 133)

beginning_cross_street.description: Name or number of the nearest cross street along the roadway where the event begins

ending_cross_street.description: Name or number of the nearest cross street along the roadway where the event ends

beginning_milepost.description: The linear distance measured against a milepost marker along a roadway where the event begins

ending_milepost.description: The linear distance measured against a milepost marker along a roadway where the event ends

start_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event begins (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

end_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event ends (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

workers_present.description: A flag indicating that there are workers present in the road event

reduced_speed_limit.description: The reduced speed limit posted within the road event

restrictions.description: Zero or more road restrictions applying to the road event

description.description: Short free text description of the road event

creation_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event was created (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

update_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the road event was last updated (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

types_of_work.description: A list of the types of work being done in a road event

lanes.description: A list of individual lanes within a road event (roadway segment)

road_event_id.description: ***DEPRECATED*** A unique identifier issued by the data feed provider to identify the work zone project or activity

road_number.description: ***DEPRECATED*** The road number designated by a jurisdiction such as a county, state or interstate (e.g. I-5, VT 133)

road_name.description: ***DEPRECATED*** Publicly known name of the road on which the event occurs

total_num_lanes.description: ***DEPRECATED*** The total number of lanes associated with the road event

Relationship.title: Relationship
Relationship.description: Identifies both sequential and hierarchical relationships between road events and other entities. For example, a relationship can be used to link multiple road events to a common 'parent', such as a project or phase, or identify a sequence of road events

first.description: Indicates the first (can be multiple) road event in a sequence of road events by RoadEventFeature 'id'

next.description: Indicates the next (can be multiple) road event in a sequence of road events by RoadEventFeature 'id'

parents.description: Indicates entities that the road event with this relationship is a part of, such as a work zone project or phase. Values can but do not have to correspond to a WZDx entity

children.description: Indicates entities that are part of the road event with this relationship, such as a detour or piece of equipment. Values can but do not have to correspond to a WZDx entity

TypeOfWork.title: Type of Work
TypeOfWork.description: A description of the type of work being done in a road event and an indication of if that work will result in an architectural change to the roadway

is_architectural_change.description: A flag indicating whether the type of work will result in an architectural change to the roadway

Lane.title: Lane
Lane.description: An individual lane within a road event

order.description: The position (index) of the lane in sequence on the roadway, where '1' represents the left-most lane

lane_number.description: ***DEPRECATED*** The number assigned to the lane to help identify its position. Flexible, but usually used for regular, driveable lanes

restrictions.description: A list of restrictions specific to the lane

LaneRestriction.title: Lane Restriction
LaneRestriction.description: A lane-level restriction, including type and value

EventType.title: Road Event Type Enumerated Type
EventType.description: The type of WZDx road event

Direction.title: Direction Enumerated Type
Direction.description: The direction for a road event based on standard naming for US roads; indicates the direction the traffic flow regardless of the real heading angle

SpatialVerification.title: Spatial Verification Enumerated Type
SpatialVerification.description: An indication of how a geographical coordinate was defined

TimeVerification.title: Time Verification Enumerated Type
TimeVerification.description: A measure of how accurate a date-time is

EventStatus.title: Event Status Enumerated Type
EventStatus.description: The status of the road event

VehicleImpact.title: Vehicle Impact Enumerated Type
VehicleImpact.description: The impact to vehicular lanes along a single road in a single direction

RoadRestriction.title: Road Restriction Enumerated Type
RoadRestriction.description: The type of vehicle restriction on a roadway

WorkTypeName.title: Work Type Name Enumerated Type
WorkTypeName.description: A high-level text description of the type of work being done in a road event

LaneStatus.title: Lane Status Enumerated Type
LaneStatus.description: The status of the lane for the traveling public

LaneType.title: Lane Type Enumerated Type
LaneType.description: An indication of the type of lane or shoulder

LaneRestrictionUnit.title: Lane Restriction Unit Enumerated Type
LaneRestrictionUnit.description: Units of measure used for the lane restriction value
